content.text:
When drawing the influence line of any quantity value, assume that the load is()<image 1>

A. unit moving load with unchanged direction 
B. moving load
C. dynamic load 
D.  movable load

When drawing the influence line of any quantity value, the load is assumed to be a unit moving load with unchanged direction. This means that the load moves along the structure while maintaining its magnitude and direction, allowing for the determination of the maximum or minimum value of the quantity at any point along the structure.

Therefore, the correct answer is:

A. unit moving load with unchanged direction
Now, output the final answer and nothing else:
